query:
SELECT f.id, f.flock_number, f.status, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flock_daily_records WHERE flock_id = f.id) as daily_records,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flock_health_records WHERE flock_id = f.id) as health_records,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flock_vaccination_schedule WHERE flock_id = f.id) as vaccinations,
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reminders WHERE flock_id = f.id) as reminders
FROM flocks f 
WHERE f.flock_number = 'FL-M2-TEST-001'
